description: Try our easy to follow Crisp Salmon With Beets, Grapefruit & Beans recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Crisp Salmon With Beets, Grapefruit & Beans Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Using a sharp knife, remove skin and pith from grapefruits and discard. Thinly slice, reserving 2 tbs juice. Combine juice, 1/4 cup oil, dill and capers in a jug. Season.

Heat remaining oil in a large non-stick frying pan over medium- high heat. Cook salmon, skin-side down, for 5 minutes or until crisp and brown. Turn and cook for a further 1 minute for medium-rare or until cooked to your liking.
Meanwhile, cook beans in boiling water for 2 minutes or until just tender. Drain.
Arrange beetroot, grapefruit and beans on plates. Top with salmon, dressing, pistachios and mint.
